content.detailedDescription: i was sealing a leak in my cabin siding at 1030 pm, starry night, no clouds in sky, back was turned to the sky, i wassquatting and i noticed a bright light behind me, i kinda turned and said thanksfor the light,i then realized my girlfriend was in the cabin and no one wasthere, a very isolated area.As i turned i saw 3 bright orange yellow glowingspheres moving to the north, no sound.  the light appeared to shine in front ofme on the siding that i was working on but i dont recall a shadow from thelight, the light just illuminated the area i was working on.I called out to mygirlfriend and she came out and i told her what happened, as  we were talkingabout it, we heard what appeared  to be thunder but as it went on for 30-45secondss we realized it sounded more like muffled explosions.The explosionsounds happened about 3 minutes after i saw the glowing spheres.
content.summary: 3 bright orange yellow spheres, bright white light

content.detailedDescription: I was on the computer in our office when i heard my wife excitedly calling me tocome outside as she could see a ufo. i went outside and saw against the blue skya very bright light followed by 4 other lights some distance behind the leading( the brightest ) light. i told my wife to get the video camera. when shereturned i began filming. it was very hard to see the objects on the lcd screenwith the back light of the sun nevertheless i continued filming while trying tozoom in on the lead object. as it was a hit or miss prospect this wasunsuccessful but after downloading it onto vhs it is clearly visible unzoomed.Filmed it for about 5 minutes. they traversed much of the sky eventuallydisappearing in the clouds in the far distance. during the event we were joinedby others who could see the 1 really bright light just before it passed behindthe distant clouds. everyone was a little excited as can be heard on the tape.
content.summary: 1 extremely bright light followed by several other

content.detailedDescription: We were driving west on pleasant grove blvd. approaching intersection atwashington blvd.  passenger, janice, looked toward chevron gas station on nwcorner of intersection, and behind and above gas station (about 20d abovehorizon) sighted group of six objects she thought were big birds coming along. as she pointed them out to richard, she noticed they were acting in a mannerbirds do not act, i.E., changing formation and moving up and down individually. richard then saw them.  they looked unusual to him, he wasnt sure they werebirds.  to get a closer look, we turned left on washington (south), thenu-turned on diamond oaks rd. (1 block away), stopped car to observe them fromintersection of diamond oaks rd. and washington, and we stepped out of car.  atthat time, they were moving towards us (toward the se).  they seemed fairlyclose to us now.  the objects moved under their own power and individually, attimes flying in pairs, straight lines, semi-circular patterns, constantlychanging their formations, some seemed to have higher altitudes than others attimesthey seemed to have no particular destination, as if they were observing ordoing some type of maneuvers.  from our long-standing bird watching activities,we were in agreement they were not birds, nor balloons, but seemed under theirown mode of power maneuvering in unusual patterns.  as the objects changeddirections, their color would change from a very bright white to a brilliantsilver.  the objects seemed to move away from us, then come back.  someformations observed: three pairs in a loose triangular shapefrom a straight line moving eastward when front object raised above the line,then the line reversed direction and made a semi-circular curvetwo groups of three at one point, forming a delta shapemaking circular and arcing turns.  we watched for about five minutes, then theobjects formed a delta shape again, and moved away from us at what appeared tobe very high speed.  richard observed the objects quickly disappearing as theymoved north-east.  we got in the car in an attempt to follow them, but whenarriving at the intersection, the objects were no where to be seen.  we drovedown pleasant grove in the direction we thought they had taken.  janice wassearching, but they were gone.  fyi: from where we were standing, we could sightthe objects at times between the two tall pine trees that were nearby.
content.summary: Six objects sighted over roseville, ca, changing f
3 white balls of light in the night sky

content.detailedDescription: Sighting account:ann lieberman did not submit this report to the florida sd, it was reported tolinda moulton howe, private investigator from penn.  the report is significantin lieu of the many investigated cases of events that occurred on september 7th,1999.  it is submitted at this time by asd lorraine gerber in as comprehensive aform as possible considering the circumstances.
content.summary: Cigar shape, windows, tubes and bracings, sarasota

content.detailedDescription: Sighting background:this is part of the sept. 7th sightings that were reported to ann lieberman, ssdsarasota county, florida  (resigned)  it was ann liebermans cases as reportedby linda moulton howe to whitley strieber on coast to coast, october 17, 1999. this case is submitted at this time by asd lorraine gerber in as comprehensive aform as possible considering the circumstances.  linda moulton howe can bereached at http://www.Eahhfiles.Com/eattho8 1 .Htm
content.summary: Starlike object becomes a craft, sarasota, fl
Changing luminosity of fast moving star
At about 10 p.M. i saw a bright fireball looking o

content.detailedDescription: This really happened- i dont use drugs.1.  i was standing on the sea shore atcardiff state beach, just relaxing watching the waves.  there is a bar nearby.
content.summary: Triangular ship - viewed for about 20seconds - off

content.detailedDescription: My mother-in-law and i were driving east up a farm road from the east shore ofseneca lake when we observed a brilliant light travelling very quickly from thesouth western horizon of the sky towards the north east.  i first noticed it atabout 20
content.summary: A brilliant light in the sky that moved unconventi
Saw black triangle shaped flying object

content.detailedDescription: Object in photo, object not seen when photo was taken. let me know if you areinterested, i can send photo. maybe its nothing maybe its something. i was onsanta rosa island, took picture of sunset. object on photo when film wasprocessed. looks like faint lines coming off object. light source looks like itis coming from wrong direction, however pensacola lighthouse in direction oflight source. normally particles on camera lensedont appear on my photos. let me know if you areinterested.Gerardgerardmars2002@yahoo.Com
content.summary: Object on photo not seen when photo was taken. pen
We were camping gazing at the stars and seen a u.F

content.detailedDescription: Sighting account:the witness was going to work that morning, leaving his house going south onhighway 41 towards tampa.  he observed an object and thought it to be a planecoming in, but he did not see a beam of light coming from it.  it had a glow,yellowish tent coming from the outside of it.  it did not have the aircraftwarning or identification lights on it.  it was coming in from the southeastheading in a westerly but southern path.  it was about 18 degrees above thetrees.  the climbs were not up yet, there were none in the sky.  he thoughtmaybe it was something in danger.  and he proceeded south on highway, he couldsee it was moving very slow.  slightly above it at the 11:00 oclock position,there were jets flying close to it.  the first one or two jets strayed close toit.  as he went down the road a little bit, the object grew smaller and thenchanged brighter.  it lost its corona around it and became a light blue and itconcentrated to a smaller even whiter light with the dark as the steel blueedge.  then it became a much smaller light and it shot out little bb likeobjects, like oil on a hot surface, and then it came back into itself and it wasgone.  when it was yellow, it was more nebulous but when it turned to the bluecolor it became sharper.  (see appendix ""1 and 2"" )i stopped at sunset road for a light, proceeding south another mile among themand there were a bunch of planes coming in from south.  they were coming in fromthe east and west, like a bunch of fingers.  i thought there were between 9 or15, i couldnt tell.  i could see as far as riverview, coming in from baerss inthat direction.  he was coming from south, southeast and southwest.  the firstobject traveled, at arms lenth during a total of three feet in the course ofabout 15 minutes.  it takes about 15 minutes to travels this distance at thistime of the morning.  it was about the size of quarter.  my windows were downand when i stopped for the lights, i did not hear any sound at all.The first light was in sight for approximate 3-4 minutes.  it moved real slow atfirst and then it moved quickly at the end.At first one or two planes were coming at it and then they were more coming inand then one i stopped at the like they were more.  they were going faster thanwhat you expect a jet to fly at that altitude, but not really fast.  i i thoughtthey must be rendering assistants, there must be plane in trouble.I took it as a matter of fact until i read in the papers that other people sawsomething that morning.  i need not flank it was a space debris, now or i sell. there was nothing there that was traveling at 17,000 mph.  this was aone-of-a-kind event, it looked like it was coming from homassassa, going tomaybe hillsbouro avenue  in tampa.  i cant say what it was, but i know therewere plane coming in to it.Pasco airport nearby and another at zephrhills.  i know all of the flightpatterns that airplanes take in this area.
content.summary: He saw the object as he drove to work.

content.detailedDescription: Interview and interrogation:from the initial telephone contact with the witness, it was clear that he had noreluctance to openly discuss his sighting. equally important, as a deputysheriff, mike realized that i would rely on his professional training to helpcontribute to an accurate account of his sighting. mike also volunteered toinquire at the sheriff department for possible additional information or witness(action pending) to better evaluate this activity.Upon my arrival at mikes home for the interview, it was immediately obviousthat his enthusiasm to discuss his sighting and not diminish.  he also showedand expressed no concern for any possible recrimination from the sheriffsdepartment for his linkage to ufo reporting.  from this atmosphere, theparaphrasing of his account that follows is presented as accurately as possibleand with his review and concurrence:"i was driving north on highway 75 and turned westward onto m. l. k. avenue.  ithen turned right (south) on falkenburg. it was then that i immediately saw anarray of very bright lights to the southwest and about 35 degrees elevation inthe sky. since i am also a private pilot, my first thought was that it may be anairplane in trouble.  i, pulled over and stopped to get a better look, i alsoinitiated a call to the airport that confirmed they had no aircraft in that areaand i concluded that the object was not any conventional airplane.  i was now nolonger driving; just sitting and looking and more accurately observing.I continue to watch and was fascinated with the lights.  they were reddish bluein color with an overall orange glow emitting.  wherever it was continued tomove from right to left (southwest towards the south) on an apparent constanttrack anarchy.  i also heard no sound from it.  i estimated it to have been atabout 35 degrees of elevation and maybe oblong or oval shaped.  i could not seeits shape that clearly. i can estimate its size either because i was primarilywatching the lights, although it seemed to be about 25 to 30 miles away.  fromthe time i stopped, i believe its lights were in view for about 20 to 25seconds until they disappeared.  it also must have been moving reasonably fastto get out of sight that quickly.  the unfortunate part is that i had a set ofbinoculars right beside me, i was so fascinated with what i was seeing that iforgot to use them for a closer look.  it was all very unusual and i aminterested to know what it was that i saw".
content.summary: Lights observed in sky, stopped car and observed
2 grid-like squares of 9 white lights. motionless.

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting at my computer when i heard a loud helicopter pass outside. thehelicopter forward white light was visible as was the red tail light. this isthe second time this summer that i have seen it. it is at least 70ft in lengthwith multiple rotors. i have never been able to distinguish any features otherthan its length. the aircrafts smart skin is the exact color as the sky. i havegood eye sight and was less than 1500 feet away from it when it passed over. iwent outside to get a better look at it but lost sight of it after a minute. itwas heading from the south to the north pdx military base at 10:18pm pst.
content.summary: Stealth helicopter with smart skin in pdx

content.detailedDescription: aprox. 8:50 p.M.  walking the dog w/ my daughter-we were looking at the sky.  i was pointing out the differences betweensatelites and stars, when i saw what i first thought to  be a plane, fairly highin the horizon, due south.  it was moving very slowly, (like a plane far away)or maybe it wasnt moving at all.  this all happened in a split second so imnot sure of what i saw first, the movement or the size, anyway, i realized thatthere were three amber colored lightsevenly spaced, parallel to each other, andthere seemed to be a soft glow between the lights.  it still appeared to greatdistance away, i would guess 10 miles or more.  i dont really have anyreference to judge night air distances.  there was no sound.  as soon as iregistered the size it shot across the sky (about one tenth of a 180 degreehorizon) and then it was gone.
content.summary: Saw 3 parallel amber lights shoot across sky and d

content.detailedDescription: Sitting on the backdoor step and at 1342 i heard a whistle (hawk like sound). ilooked straight up (thinking to see a hawk) and saw this black coffin shapedobject flying directly away from me at a high, straight, steady, rate of speeduntil it disappeared behind some trees directly in front of me. i then realizedit was no hawk and thought of getting my binoculars, but there was no time. atits rate of speed, it would have crossed the entire sky, directly over me inabout 6 sec. i heard the whistle 1 more time before i lost sight of it. myimpression was that it was low, 800 to 1500 ft. have there ever been any otherreports of a similiar (shape, color, speed) object?
content.summary: Saw black, coffin shaped ufo, streak accross sky,

content.detailedDescription: Upon arrival on-site, at the motel, the witness made it clear that a taperecorder could not be used.   also expressed was some concern for possiblenegative public relations that could result for the motel and the witness. there was some reluctance expressed to even allow an interview to be done.  bothinvestigators expressed their understanding of the concern and explained thatcomplete anonymity would be maintained.  this arrangement was acceptable and theinterview proceeded.   my best memory of the witnesss narration  follows:i was standing on the (north side of the) second story walkway of the motel atabout 5:05 when i first saw some very bright (assumed) aircraft headlights rightover there (pointing northwest over the water at about 20 degrees of armelevation while standing at the point of observation).  the airport is alsonearby right over there (pointing northward) a few miles and that entire area iswithin the normal flying pattern for its aircraft.  i first thought that a planewas either coming in for a landing or taking off.  i soon changed my mind.  thisthing was coming too fast for that, and then i realized it was several vehiclesin formation.  the one in front was big and triangular in shape.  there werethree others following behind with i believe similar shapes.  it was easy to seethe lead vehicle because those following behind it were in close formation andwere shinning their lights on it.  i could clearly see its unusual triangularshape and the surface looked like shinny metal or silver colored.  as theformation came closer,  it still remained out over the water.   then i walked(about fifteen feet) over here (to the northwest of the building) to be able tocontinue keeping them in sight.  when they were right out there (perpendicularto the coastline-westward) i knew i was seeing something very different fromnormal aircraft.  they were going so fast that i felt sure i would hear a shockor see their afterburners lit up, but it was completely silent.  it was eerie. i felt strange, as if the hairs were standing up on the back of my neck.  asthey continued southward the formation stayed right together, but i could seespace between the vehicles.  i never saw anything change or heard any noise.They quickly flew on by and went out of sight that way (pointing southward).  idont know whats going on, but it didnt seem normal.  so, i later reported itto the news media.  well, i guess thats my story.  i still dont know what tothink of it and would like to know more about it, since the news media tookpretty light of it.
content.summary: Sept. 7th, 1999 sarasota six speeding lights in  f

content.detailedDescription: I was going to work, approximately 4:55 a.M. and i saw an object that lookedlike a jet liner that was about to crash, i got out of the truck, left the motorrunning and lights on.  i saw a blinking light on the front, a blinking light onthe rear, a glow around the object.  it was not on fire.  i thought it was ablimp that came back from an exercise.   i got back into the truck afterwatching it for approximately five minutes, i didnt hear anything, no airhitting anything, no engine.  (the witness was alone in the car at the time.) he looked to the south while on the highway (which was going west at that time). the object was heading towards englewood, to the west.  at arms length themovement from what i saw was approximately 12 inches for the time i watched.  he thought, what the h  is going on here.  i thought it might be landing,because it wasnt going anywhere.  when he determined that it was not a planecrashing he just started to observe it.  he thought it was some kind of blimp atthat time.  it was moving very slowly to the southwest.  the light on the front was white.  the rear light was blue, flashing like thelight on top of a bus.  it was a kind of glow.   it had three windows, like a commercial jet liner, but  i just saw it like a passenger blimp.  the lightsinside the windows were like lights on in a room.   the outer area was glowingall around it, like a yellow-white look to it.   it was approximately 225 ftlong , like a dc10, it was big, and it was approx. 1000 yards away from me and800-850 ft. above ground.   it was a wooded area, thats why i stopped, ithought i would get a pinpoint of the area where it went down.   i left becausei had to go to work.   it was just about 5:05 a.M.  2 of 4i stopped at  a 7-ll for my coffee when i got off  75 onto exit 39 there werequite a few police cars and fire engines roaming around in circles.  i wasbetween exit 33 and 35.Then i came into work it was about 6:00 a.M..  i got to talking to a friend ofmine about an hour later and he asked did you hear about this ufo sighting? what do you mean? i asked him.  he told me that ufos were reported that on thenews.   i then told him that i saw something this morning.  it hit me real hadwhen he told me that.  then i called the sarasota tribune and then smn news (?) called me and i toldthem the same thing.  when i did get off 75 onto exit 39 there were quite a fewpolice cars and fire engines roaming around in circles.  i was between exit 33and 35.
content.summary: Sept. 7th, 1999 sarasota cigar shaped object

content.detailedDescription: i was driving home from a grange meeting around 11 p.M. at night listening tothe radio with music, when all at once i seen a red flashing light in the sky,about that time some trees cut out my view, so i kept driving and then i seen itagain. it was a very large round object appeared overhead in the sky about treetop high with amber lights all around it and the rest of it was real red allover. it kept coming closer so i stopped the car and turned off the radio andjust looked at it because i was frightened and thought it was going to land inthe road in front of me. no one else was on the road but me, and i was alone soi was very scared. i kept watching it to see what it was going to do, and all atonce it disappeared. it was going very slow. this was april either the third orthe seventeenth, as that is grange meetings. it was real weird, as i had neverseen anything like that before, and i hope i never do again. it looked like youcould see out of it from all around it. it did not make any noise. i would saythat it was traveling about 35 mph. it just kept coming closer to the ground.When it got below the tree top, it just disappeared out of sight. where itdisappeared there was no trees, just an open field. i rolled down the car windowso i could see better to try to tell what it was. after it disappeared i startedthe car again, and kept looking to see if i could see it again, and i didnt soi kept going home. i wa on worthington road close to alum creek when i spottedthe object. the next morning i told my husband what i saw. he just shunned itoff so i didnt tell anyone else about it, as they would think that i was crazy.My niece was telling me about people spotting objects around, so i told herabout it. later my daughter and others spotted an object in our fields onenight, but it was different than what i seen. i do not drink, so i was of soundmind, and i know what i seen was frightening, so now i do very little driving atnight by myself. i do feel that someone or something is watching our country,and someday may invade us and we will not have any control over it. once beforei was coming home from work around dark, i spotted an object in the sky that wasodd. it was going real fast. that was about four years ago about 1980 around 6pm in march. it wasnt a plane. it was small, sorta like a big bird with a tailand it left a trail behind it like when an airplane writes in the sky, or when acar starts up and leaves a trail of smoke behind. it was very low but speedy. itwas over worthington road going north at a very high rate of speed. it was soonout of sight. these objects are very queer looking. i am of sound mind and iknow what i saw. i have heard of ufos but i didnt believe that people seenthem, but now i do believe that they seen something. we dont know what theyare. (?) other people seen it but are afraid to say anything about it like iwas.
content.summary: Sightiing of a round, red ufo

content.detailedDescription: a friend of mine named peggy n. and i were leaving the back door of the libraryon germantown pike. it was august or september of 1971 or 1972. there was aclear sky and the entrance and parking lot looked south past an alley andbackyards to a residential area. it was getting dark earlier (7 or 7:30) and wasdusk. as we were leaving the library i turned to my friend and said, "do you seethat?" we saw a cigar-shaped object approximately 50 feet above the ground justpast the alley. i noticed red, blue, and green flashing colored lights whichflashed in a pattern. the whole neighborhood was deadly silent, no sound, nosmells. the craft made no noise, it was just hanging there, hovering there. wewere very scsred. we statred walking towards it, peggy was very curious. i saidto her, "dont go towards it." the craft then began a slow slant type of ascentand then it took off real fast and zoomed away. direction of the departure wasfrom the south to the southwest. we lost sight of it due to the distance. weobserved it altogether about 4 minutes. it was a large object, about 2semi-tractor trailer trucks in size.We sat in the car for quite a long time and then telephoned whio-tv channel 7. iwas advised that many sightings took place that day. it was mentioned on thetelevision that evening. i believe i was 19 years old at the time of thesighting.
content.summary: Singhting of a cigar-shaped ufo

content.detailedDescription: The witness called the ufo reporting center, seattle, wa on 9/7/99 and the casewas taken from their information.  the witness was asleep in her bedroom whenshe awoke at 3:08 a.M. the room was fully illuminated with a silvery whitelight.  her first thought was that it might be lightning, but when she lookedout of her bedroom window, which is situated directly on the bay, she observedtwo hugh balloon-shaped spheres gliding from west to east over the bay.  thespeheres were about six times the size of a full moon but much brighter.  theywere about 600-700 feet above the bay and so close to her window that she feltshe could almost reach out and touch them.  there were rays of white lightstreaming from the bottom of each.  the objects did not make any noise.  theircolor was a luminous white.  the night was clear , no precipitation and the baywas serene and calm.  the spheres were traveling rapidly and when she changed her view to the kitchen,the objects were gone.  the witness said this was nothing that she had ever seenbefore.  the light was so intense it permeated every corner of her bedroom.  shefelt awe and peace.  she then went back to bed and slept soundly for theremainder of the night.
content.summary: Sept. 7th, 1999 two spheres

content.detailedDescription: my family had just returned form michigan, i spoke to my mother and went outsidein the back yard with my boyfriend phil. it was on sunday evening at about 9:30p.M. we walked to the dayton country club golf course and were sitting when wesaw a cylinder-shaped, saucer-shaped object in the sky. it was right below cloudlevel and it was partly cloudy. there were lights on the front and sides, whitesparkling lights. we saw it in the south and it appeared to go north towarddowntown dayton. some of the white lights blinked, but it was hard to determinewhich ones. like it might have been a plane (i first thought) but it wasdifferent than a plane. the lights were not exactly like plane lights. we sawyour (mufo) ufo article in the newspaper and my booyfrined insisted that i calland report this sighting. we must have watched the object on and off all of twoto three minutes.
content.summary: Sighting of cylindrical saucer -shaped ufo.

content.detailedDescription: The witness woke up abruptly at 4:49 a.M. because colored lights were flashingin her bedroom.  they were so bright and she said that she was more wide awakethan she usually is on rising in the morning.  she then went into the livingroom which also was lit with flashing colored lights.  she immediately openedthe locked front door and looked around the area and saw nothing, she wasexpecting to see emergency vehicles outside.  she then looked up to the west tosee a swirling, beautiful bunch of lights that were the cause of all thebrightness in the surrounding area.  these lights were forming a giant counterclockwise circle and contained every color of the rainbow, pink, rose, red, redorange, yellow,yellow orange, green, white, blue green and violet, she said.  the were swirlingin a counter-clockwise direction and somehow made the witness stare in awe atwhat she described as the most beautiful thing she had ever seen (figure 1). this swirling light formation was traveling very slowly from the west towardsthe south and just above a small palm tree and light post only 250 to 300 ft.Away when the witness first saw it.  she then started yelling for her son, whowas asleep in the living room, to come and see this.  after more yelling andwatching the object briefly out of the living room window, the witness persuadedhim to come out and look.  after only a very short time she was again outsidewatching this swirling light phenomena move a little to the south.  her son wasable to see the object as it was in a second phase, a turquoise ball with astreak behind it (figure 2).  it was approximately 75 ft. wide.  after approx.Two minutes both witnesses were then astonished to see it change into a saucerlike object which formed a cloud around it and then rose directly up anddisappeared.  both witnesses agreed to witness twos drawings of what they sawand that the gray object had two white lights at either end.  both witnesses suddenly became frightened and ran into the house, barricadingthemselvesand a younger child in the house.  she called her husband at work who was on amidnight shift asking him to come right home.  she continued to secure the houseand when he came home he found them both distraught.They called the airports and did not get a satisfactory answer nor did they knowwho they should call for help.  after waiting on hold, the last airport saidthere had been a lot of meteor sightings this morning and also that  russiansatellite debris had reentered the atmosphere.  they informed the husband tocall the police.  the local tv station heard of their calls and cameras andmedia employees arrived five hours later and interviewed her on camera.  she had also called the mufon hotline and lorraine gerber, responded with aphone call in the morning arranging for an interview at 1:00 p.M. thatafternoon.  three investigators, lorraine gerber, robert kruse and jimmy kruse,arrived on the scene for the initial interview and lorraine gerber followed upwith several other visits after that time.  bob kruse  returned to the area several days later, to take some of the measurements.Because of the negative reaction she received from her family and friends whosaw the fox tv news coverage, she preferred to have us withhold  names etc.
content.summary: Spiraling pinwheel of color changes into ufo at cl

content.detailedDescription: we were at the nellis air force base lookingfor u.F.O.S.  we had read that the nellis area was an area where u.F.O.S couldbe found with the correct equipment.  we brought with us a very sensitiveinfra-red system.  when the system was turned on we immediately picked up thesignature for the u.F.O.At first we thought the object may have been a planeflying through the nellis airspace.  the object did not fly in a straight lineas other planes do.  the craftzig zagged and kept flying in strange patterns theentire evening.  when we returned the next evening the object could still befound over the air force base!There is something out of the ordinary flyingabove nellis and should be investigated.  whether or not it is the actual alienship needs to be determined byprofessional researchers.  if you can get out hereto take a look at what we have found i think it would make a good report.  itappears the craft is not leaving the nellis area and neither are we.                                                                waldir haraculamo                                                                victor sauza
content.summary: u.F.O. seen flying around nellis air force base u

content.detailedDescription: thought i was looking at the planet mars, but marswas in the southwest sky.  light started to move from south to north, then madea sharpe turn to the east and started to flicker, bye the time i was able tomove to a darker location of my work site, to observe better, objest was gone. my reaction to this was i think i am seeing a ufo and felt elated.
content.summary: Red/orange light moving in the sky
